# econ-data-mcp - AI Economic Data Platform
# https://openecon.ai

## About
econ-data-mcp is an AI-powered economic data aggregation platform that allows users to query economic data using natural language. It provides access to 10+ authoritative data sources including FRED, World Bank, IMF, UN Comtrade, Statistics Canada, Eurostat, OECD, BIS, ExchangeRate-API, and CoinGecko.

## Capabilities
- Natural language queries for economic data
- Access to GDP, inflation, unemployment, trade data, interest rates, exchange rates, and more
- Interactive data visualization with line, bar, and table views
- Data export in CSV and JSON formats
- Pro Mode for advanced AI-generated Python analysis
- MCP (Model Context Protocol) server for programmatic access

## Data Sources
1. FRED (Federal Reserve Economic Data) - US economic data with 90,000+ series
2. World Bank - Global development indicators for 200+ countries
3. IMF (International Monetary Fund) - International financial statistics
4. UN Comtrade - International trade data and bilateral trade flows
5. Statistics Canada - Canadian economic and social data
6. Eurostat - European Union statistics
7. OECD - Economic data for OECD member countries
8. BIS (Bank for International Settlements) - Central bank and financial stability data
9. ExchangeRate-API - Real-time and historical currency exchange rates
10. CoinGecko - Cryptocurrency prices and market data

## Example Queries
- "Show me US GDP growth for the last 10 years"
- "Compare inflation rates between US, UK, and Japan"
- "What is the unemployment rate in Canada?"
- "Show me China's total exports for 2020-2024"
- "EUR to USD exchange rate history"
- "Bitcoin price for the last year"

## API Access
econ-data-mcp provides an MCP (Model Context Protocol) server endpoint at:
- Endpoint: https://openecon.ai/mcp
- Transport: Server-Sent Events (SSE)
- Available operation: query_data

## Contact
Email: hanlulong@gmail.com
Website: https://openecon.ai

## Technical Details
- Frontend: React/TypeScript with Vite
- Backend: Python FastAPI
- Visualization: Recharts
- Authentication: Supabase

## Usage
Visit https://openecon.ai/chat to start querying economic data. No registration required for basic queries.
